trans-unit.source: Contains extended error information about an error that occurred when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Invoke*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關發生之錯誤的擴充的錯誤資訊時<xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Invoke*>方法呼叫。</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Invoke*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref> class with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref>類別，以指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref> class with the specified serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref>類別指定的序列化資訊和資料流內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref> class with the specified string and exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref>具有指定的字串和例外狀況類別。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Populates the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 於其中填入<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>物件序列化所需的資料<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryServicesCOMException"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that is the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>是這個序列化的目的端的物件。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
